column1: Braga was a captain of the Lake-town guard in the The Hobbit (film series) film trilogy. He was played by Mark Mitchinson.
Braga and his guards track Bard when he first arrives with Bilbo Baggins and Thorin and Company
column2: though Bard manages to keep them hidden (with help from the Dwarves themselves). Later
column3: he is ordered by the Master of Lake-town to arrest Bard locks him up (though not without a struggle from Bard himself).The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug During Smaugs attack on the Lake-town
column4: he and a few other soldiers assist the Master in emptying the towns treasury into a boat in which they then attempt to flee the wreckage. Braga presumably perishes along with the Master and everyone else in the boat when the slain Dragonss lifeless body falls on top of them while plummeting to its final resting place at the bottom of Long Lake.The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
